title: Global revenue of Puma 2000 to 2019
summary: In general Revenue in billion euros has rose over the Year.
Revenue in billion euros is slightly decreasing from 2011 to 2012, roughly constant from 2012 to 2014, and finally slightly increasing from 2014 to 2015.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
Maximum Revenue in billion euros, about 3.39 was reported at Year 2015
Minimum Revenue in billion euros about 2.97 was reached at Year 2014
